abstract: Kevin J. Martin’s decision to scale back his agenda to regulate cable television more tightly was a significant though not total victory for the industry.
snippet: Kevin J. Martin’s decision to scale back his agenda to regulate cable television more tightly was a significant though not total victory for the industry.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 27  In the face of a lobbying blitzkrieg from cable television executives and their lobbyists, the head of the Federal Communications Commission said this evening that he had struck a compromise to salvage but scale back his agenda to regulate the industry more tightly.

headline.main: F.C.C. Chief Forced to Scale Back Cable Plan
